author: @wkyt
title: Winter Storm Watch issued January 2 at 3:16PM EST until January 6 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Louisville KY
text:
Updated: 28 minutes ago
The name of the person killed in a crash in Lexington has been released.
Updated: 58 minutes ago
Officers were called just before 7 a.m. Thursday to the 4000 block of Tates Creek Road.
Updated: 58 minutes ago
It happened on the Bluegrass Parkway in Nelson County.
Updated: 2 hours ago
A man has learned his sentence in a Lexington homicide case.
Updated: 2 hours ago
A Kentucky inmate is back behind bars after escaping.
Updated: 6 hours ago
The brothers accused of killing a woman and injuring a man at a Lexington party this past fall appeared in court together for the first time Thursday morning.
